ADVANCED_TARGET_SCANNER_DESCRIPTION.message: Scanóir fadraoin a chlúdaíonn réaltchóras ina iomláine.

ATMOSPHERIC_SHIELDING_DESCRIPTION.message: Cosnaíonn seo do spáslong ar theas nuair a thagann sé ar ais san atmaisféar.

ATMOSPHERIC_SHIELDING_HEAVY.description: Will withstand higher pressures than normal Atmospheric Shielding

ATMOSPHERIC_SHIELDING_HEAVY_DESCRIPTION.message: A more capable version of Atmospheric Shields

CARGO_LIFE_SUPPORT.message: Córas cothaithe beatha don bhá lasta

CARGO_LIFE_SUPPORT_DESCRIPTION.message: Ligeann seo duit lasta beo a iompar.

CARGO_SCOOP_DESCRIPTION.message: Ligeann seo duit cochaill lasta a bhailiú ón spás.

DAMAGE_PER_SHOT.description: Tooltip explaining weapon damage per shot

ECM_ADVANCED_DESCRIPTION.message: Córas cosanta frithdhiúracán a úsáideann frithbhearta leictreonacha, atá in ann diúracáin fhrithinge níos cumasaí a scriosadh.

ECM_BASIC_DESCRIPTION.message: Córas cosanta frithdhiúracán a úsáideann frithbhearta leictreonacha, atá in ann diúracáin fhrithinge áirithe a scriosadh.

EMPTY_SLOT.description: Text indicating an empty equipment slot.

FUEL_SCOOP_DESCRIPTION.message: Ligeann seo duit breosla hidrigine a bhailiú ó fhathaigh gháis.

HULL_AUTOREPAIR_DESCRIPTION.message: Deisíonn seo cabhail na loinge go huathoibríoch i gcás damáiste.

HYPERCLOUD_ANALYZER_DESCRIPTION.message: Déanann seo anailís ar néalta hipearspáis chun an sprioc a fháil amach, chomh maith leis an am imeachta agus an am sroichte.

LASER_COOLING_BOOSTER.message: Treiseoir do Chóras Fuaraithe an Léasair

LASER_COOLING_BOOSTER_DESCRIPTION.message: Córas fuaraithe níos fearr do na hairm atá agat.

MININGCANNON_17MW_DESCRIPTION.message: Úsáidtear é seo chun mianadóireacht a dhéanamh ar astaróidigh atá lán de mhianraí.

MININGCANNON_5MW_DESCRIPTION.message: Úsáidtear é seo chun mianadóireacht a dhéanamh ar astaróidigh atá lán de mhianraí.

MULTI_SCOOP.description: A ship equipment: a cargo scoop and fuel scoop combined into one

MULTI_SCOOP_DESCRIPTION.message: Cé nach bhfuil sé seo chomh héifeachtach le scúp breosla, ligeann sé duit idir lasta agus bhreosla a bhailiú

ORBIT_SCANNER.description: A ship equipment that records data of terrain, for cartography mapping/geological survey. Note: Scout Mission module reference and distinguishes between 'orbital' and 'surface' scanner types, the former scans planet from orbit, the latter from low altitude.

ORBIT_SCANNER_DESCRIPTION.message: Scans planet from orbit, for scientific data

ORBIT_SCANNER_GOOD.description: A sensor used to scan planets from high altitude / orbit + model number (that's minimum km altitude)

ORBIT_SCANNER_GOOD_DESCRIPTION.message: Scans planet from orbit, for scientific data, with high resolution and wide aperture lens

RADAR_DESCRIPTION.message: Soláthraíonn seo léarscáil 3T de longa i ngar duit.

SHIELD_ENERGY_BOOSTER_DESCRIPTION.message: Méadaíonn seo ráta athluchtaithe na sciath.

SHIELD_GENERATOR_DESCRIPTION.message: Tugann gach ceann a fheistíonn tú cosaint níos fearr don chabhail.

SHOTS_PER_MINUTE.description: Tooltip explaining weapon fire rate / RPM counter

STARTING_SCAN.message: Scanadh á thosú; fad na sprice:

SURFACE_SCANNER.description: A ship equipment that records data of terrain, for cartography mapping/geological survey. Note: Scout Mission module reference and distinguishes between 'orbital' and 'surface' scanner types, the former scans planet from orbit, the latter from low altitude. Model manufacturer name is meant to sound like a cheap brand.

SURFACE_SCANNER_DESCRIPTION.message: Cartography mapping and geological survey recorder

SURFACE_SCANNER_GOOD.description: A ship equipment that records data of terrain, for cartography mapping/geological survey. Note: Scout Mission module reference and distinguishes between 'orbital' and 'surface' scanner types. Model manufacturer name is meant to be associated with high quality.

SURFACE_SCANNER_GOOD_DESCRIPTION.message: High resolution cartography mapping and geological survey recorder

TARGET_SCANNER_DESCRIPTION.message: Úsáidtear scanóir chun stádas long eile a iniúchadh, chomh maith leis an trealamh agus an lasta orthu.

THRUSTERS_BASIC_DESCRIPTION.message: Inneall modhnaithe atá ceadaithe do do long.

THRUSTERS_BEST_DESCRIPTION.message: Inneall saincheaptha a sholáthraíonn an t-aschur is fearr is féidir a fháil.

THRUSTERS_MEDIUM_DESCRIPTION.message: Inneall optamaithe a laghdaíonn neamhéifeachtúlacht agus a fheabhsaíonn aschur cumhachta.

TOTAL_MODULE_CAPACITY.description: Tooltip explaining module capacity of specific slot

TOTAL_MODULE_WEIGHT.description: Tooltip explaining total equipped weight of specific slot

TRADE_COMPUTER.description: Ship equipment computing profitable commodities to trade between two systems

TRADE_COMPUTER_DESCRIPTION.message: Taispeánann seo na tráchtearraí is fearr le trádáil idir an réaltchóras roghnaithe agus an ceann reatha

UNOCCUPIED_CABIN_DESCRIPTION.message: Tá cábán breise ag teastáil le paisinéir amháin a iompar
